description.value:
"Your formative years were spent in the presence of many tutors, learning the history of the Imperium and the part your ancestors played in that history."

Long hours of study, and longer ones of rote-learning and recitation, have given you a significant insight into matters historical, and the habits of your youth stay with you even to this dayâ€”you retain a deep curiosity about the events of ancient times.

You were taught the lore of your ancestors from an early age, and your family's role in Imperial history is something you know intimately.

system.benefit: You gain Scholastic Lore (Archaic) as a trained Skill, and Scholastic Lore (Legend) as an untrained Basic Skill.

prerequisites.text: A Long and Glorious History lineage

system.notes: Grants Scholastic Lore (Archaic) trained and Scholastic Lore (Legend) as Basic.

specialAbilities.name: Historical Knowledge
specialAbilities.description: Scholastic Lore (Legend) becomes a Basic Skill for you, even though it is normally Advanced. You can attempt tests with this skill untrained at half your Intelligence value.
